All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawer
public class PitermanStateInfoDrawer
extends IdleDrawer<PitermanState>

This is a drawer that can display the information of a state with a compact Safra tree.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

Constructor Detail

PitermanStateInfoDrawer

public PitermanStateInfoDrawer(PitermanState s,
                               int x,
                               int y,
                               java.awt.Rectangle r)
Constructs this drawer to display the information of a state at a specified location within a specified visible area.

Parameters:
s - the state with information to be displayed
x - the x coordinate of the upper left location for the information display area
y - the y coordinate of the upper left location for the information display area
r - the whole visible area
